#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t,n,r,a,b,c,i,fact;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        fact=1;
        cin>>a>>b;

        n=a;
        r=b;
        //c=n-r;

        //r=b>c?b:c;
        if(r<n/2)
            r=n-r;

        for(i=r+1;i<=n;i++)
            fact=fact*i;

        for(i=2;i<=n-r;i++)
            fact=fact/i;

        cout<<fact<<endl;

    }

  return 0;
}
